history.text: Hello. What's the name of the movie?
Hi, the name of the movie is Zootopia

Could you tell me a bit 
about the plot line of the movie?

The movie is about a world of talking animals. Judy is a bunny from Bunnyburrow who movies to the city of Zootopia to become a cop. Her boss does not believe she was what it takes to be a real cop, so he assigns her to parking duty since she's only a bunny. On her first day, she gets hustled by two foxes.
I have to make a decision on whether or not I want to watch this movie. The plot line sounds interesting.
Is it a cartoon movie?
Yes, it's animated.Rotten Tomatoes gave it a 98% rating and critics said it was funny, smart, and even brilliant. It seems very positive
Would you choose to watch the movie if you had the option?
Yes, it seems like it is well respected, and it's inspirational as well as entertaining
It sounds like a movie that would teach positive morals to children.
Is it suitable for all ages, do you think that even adults would enjoy it?
It's a family movie, so anyone can enjoy it. It deals with stereotypes, so adults will find it informative as well
Ah I see. Have you watched this movie before?
Yes, I saw it in the theater when it was released
Is it a relatively newer film?
It is! it came out in 2016
All the more reason to watch it. Do you think that the protagonist is a character that a lot of people can resonate with?

It depends. The protagonist is a female rabbit who is deemed "weak" but over comes this by proving how strong he is by solving a crime in less than ten hours. Anyone who has had to overcome
 adversity can relate
Solving a crime in less than ten hours? That sounds remarkable. Is she a character that left an impression on you, personally?

I'm a female, and I look younger than I am, so people always mistake me for not being able to achieve things. I felt like Judy at certain points when people tell her she won't be able to do anything because she's only a little bunny
I also have the same problem. I think I definitely want to see this animated film now.
If you could hold it in comparison to any other film, which film would that be?

Since it's an animated film, I could compare Judy to Buzz from Toy Story. Buzz is told by Woody that he's only a toy, he can't fly or be a hero, but his wings help fly them into their owner's car when they go missing and the car is driving away. Judy becomes a hero by saving the day and figuring out why some of the other animals are becoming aggressive
I loved Toy Story. Such a good film, but the last film made me quite sad--especially the ending.
Does this film have a happy ending?
Also thank you for your thorough and detailed explanations.
The film has a happy ending-- judy and the fox who scammed her in the beginning become friends, and she finds a job on the police force for him
Glad to hear that. So are Judy and the Fox sidekicks?
Towards the end, yes! It's a good story about over coming differences
Would you recommend me to watch this film?
Yes, it sounds like you would enjoy it
I think I will watch it.
Great!
Thank you for your help!

uid1response.feedback: The other user enjoyed the movie and convinced me of the movies' good morals and inspirational protagonist.
